alert.note: Alert for Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Baker, northeastern Columbia, northeastern Hamilton, Echols, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and southeastern Charlton Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Needmore to St. George. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Jennings, Fargo, Statenville, Taylor, Needmore, St. George and Belmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
